result.eng: I went around the house several times.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uair
result.orig: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uair
result.html: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uairI went around the house several times.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé ṫart ar an teaċ cúpla uairI went around the house several times.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: We were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ga: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaitheWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí aíonna le ḃeiṫ ag teaċt isteaċ as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaiṫeWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.

result.eng: The attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ga: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.orig: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.html: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ponchtml: Is cosúil go raiḃ na hionsaiṫe seo á mbeartú ag saiġdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
